entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tadoule Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:24 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -32.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tadoule Lake Airport 08:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

Temperature: -32.6°C
Pressure: 103.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 72 %

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 48 this morning and minus 39 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
